name: Gingerbread Man Lotion Bars
description:
Why are these little guys smiling? It's because they are loaded with skin-loving butters and oils that are sure to make YOU smile! These lotion bars are all natural and scented with Litsea Cubeba essential oil. 

All you have to do it rub a small piece against your skin and watch it melt before your eyes. Massage it and watch it keep your skin hydrated for hours!

Vegan Friendly. Natural. Approximately 1 oz.

**The price is for ONE bar**

name: Natural Hemp Soap Holder
description:
As if our products weren't natural enough, make your hand-crafted soaps happy by pairing them up with this beautiful hand-crocheted soap holder made from hemp thread!

Eco-friendly. Hand-crocheted. Hemp. 

(Soap sold separately)

name: 100% Cotton Face Wash Cloth
description:
Tired of using the rough towel wash cloth on your face? Instead try this 100% cotton hand-crocheted wash cloth that's soft enough for your face, the perfect size and even has a loop for easy hanging.

Machine wash safe. Cotton. Measures approximately 5" x 5.5"

name: Fancy Wire Soap Dish 2
description:
Don't let your beautifully hand-crafted soaps sit on stagnant water; display them on this fancy wire soap dish! Serving dual purpose, this soap dish also allows for maximum air flow so that your hand-crafted soaps last longer. 

Soap Suds By Pam
"Going Back to the Basics"

name: Fancy Wire Soap Dish
description:

name: Baby Bottom Baby Lotion
description: This lotion is 98% natural with coconut oil derivatives. It is very light, yet fluffy and sensitive enough for the smallest member of your family...your baby!

name: Apple Rose Bath Salts
description:
A blend of premium salts (to include Himalayan Pink Sea Salt) to help condition and soften your skin while enjoying the invigorating scent of Apple Rose during a nice warm bath!

Simply add a tablespoon (or two!) to warm bath water and enjoy!

name: Wake Up Jolt
description:
Energize yourself with this soap that is sure to give you a nice jolt during your morning shower! The soap has an aroma blend of spearmint, peppermint, wintergreen with a faint base note of citrus.

This is a limited edition soap which will be discontinued once all bars are SOLD OUT! Get your bar while they last!

name: Gift Baskets
description:
Comes with your choice of the following:

*Two soaps (your choice; subject to availability)
*Foam Loofah
*Hands & Feet Sugar Scrub (2 oz)
*Bath Salts (5 oz)
*Surprise Sample-sized product

OR

*Two soaps (your choice; subject to availability)
*Hand crocheted wash cloth
*Luxury Facial Sugar Scrub (2 oz)
*Luxury Facial Cream (2 oz)
*Surprise Sample-sized product

name: Pumpkin Pie Soap
description: SEASONAL! Take advantage of this wonderful soap while supplies last. It is made with real pumpkin and ground oats for a gentle exfoliating experience.

name: Island Nectar
description:
This soap is magnificently juicy and fruity! Do you need to get away from the stresses of life for a little while? Allow Island Nectar to take you to your own private paradise. 

(Does not come with purple flower)

name: Cedarwood Soap
description: Woodsy, masculine, amazing! This soap is perfect for hunters looking to shield their scent, for those who like to go camping or for Cedar Wood lovers. As a bonus, this soap contains poppy seeds, so no loofah necessary!

name: Luxury Facial Sugar Scrub
description:
This luxurious facial sugar scrub is just what your face has been craving for! Wash your face with this gentle scrub first thing in the morning for a wonderful, minty "pick-me-up!" 

Made with peppermint essential oil and naturally colored with rose clay.

name: White Tea & Ginger Luxury Facial Cream
description:
This light, but fluffy luxury cream is exactly what your face has been craving for! It is lightly scented with fresh white tea and ginger, perfect for all year round!

2 oz Jar

name: Sinus Relief Bath Tea
description:
An invigorating herbal blend of eucalyptus, peppermint, elder flower, juniper, & fennel mixed with a variety of salts and essential oils to relax and enjoy!

3 oz one-time-use tea bag

Soap Suds By Pam
"Going Back to the Basics"

name: Lavender Milk Bath Tea
description:
Rough week? Let it pass while spoiling yourself with this luxurious milk bath tea. It is said that Cleopatra used to bathe in milk, so why shouldn't you? This milk tea comes with a blend of premium powdered milks, lavender buds and a hint of cocoa butter for a moisturizing finish!

Soap Suds By Pam
"Going Back to the Basics"

name: Fountain of Youth Soap
description:
This magnificent soap has fresh air notes, a hint of Japanese grapefruit, spring melons, rose, lotus blossoms, and lily of the valley. As if that's not enough, this soap has macadamia oil and avocado oil which are wonderful for mature and tired skin.

Soap Suds By Pam
"Going Back to the Basics"

name: Sea Side Soap
description: Enjoy the gentle scent of sea breeze year round! Living near the ocean is not necessary!

name: Butt Naked Sugar Scrub
description:
Are flip-flop and sandal season drying out your feet? How about your tired working hands? Give them both a mini spa session with this luxurious sugar scrub! Butt Naked is the perfect scent of honeydew melons, strawberries & apples for hot summer days and cold winter nights... and never mind all the wonderful skin loving oils I added such as extra virgin olive oil and coconut oil. As if that's not enough, I also added a good amount of luxury Argan oil, which is wonderful for mature and dry skin, and extra vitamin E for its antioxidant properties!

Simply take a dime-sized amount of sugar scrub, wet your hands a little and massage for about 30 seconds. Rinse. Dry and Enjoy!

Caution: take extra care when using the sugar scrub in the shower as the oils can make the surrounding area slippery. 

Soap Suds By Pam
"Going Back to the Basics"

name: Lemon Sugar Sugar Scrub
description:
**This product is ONLY available upon request.** 

Is the Fall and Winter season drying out your feet? How about your tired working hands? Give them both a mini spa session with this luxurious sugar scrub! Lemon Sugar is the perfect citrus scent for the hot summer days and cold winter nights... and never mind all the wonderful skin loving oils I added such as extra virgin olive oil and coconut oil. If that's not all, I also added a good amount of argan oil, which is wonderful for mature and dry skin, and extra vitamin E for its antioxidant properties!

Simply take a dime-sized amount of sugar scrub, wet your hands a little and massage for about 30 seconds. Rinse. Dry and Enjoy!

Caution: take extra care when using the sugar scrub in the shower as the oils can make the surrounding area slippery.

name: Crispy Lemongrass Hemp
description:
Let the invigorating scent of lemongrass energize you while you bathe or shower! 

This soap is all natural and vegan friendly containing body-loving oils, bentonite clay and plenty of vitamin E!

*Lemongrass is said to have strong anti-microbial and anti-fungal properties. When the essential oil is used in aromatherapy, it is said that it restores and revitalizes the whole body, helping relieve headaches, body aches and stress-related conditions. 

*Hempseed oil contains a high amount of polyunsaturated essential fatty acids, which makes it a wonderful ingredient in anti-inflammatory skin care formulations. Hempseed oil helps heal skin lesions, balance dry skin and fights skin inflammation.   

Soap Suds By Pam
"Going Back to the Basics"

Information marked with an asteric (*) was obtained from other websites. SSBP does not claim that these soaps have medicinal properties nor that they will cure any skin condition

name: Shades of Gray (For Him)
description:
This wonderful soap designed specifically for men has a modern, classy and sexy fragrance blend of bergamot, lemon, silver fir, and geranium. 

The gray tones are created using all natural bamboo charcoal. 

Soap Suds by Pam
"Going Back to the Basics"

name: Sweet Delight Soap
description:
These soaps are not only pleasing to the eye, but they are wondrous to the skin! Now with added Vitamin E and Argan Oil, these soaps will have your skin begging for more. Some of the oils include olive oil, castor oil, sesame oil and argan oil among other great ingredients. Each bar of soap weighs approximately 4.0 ounces.

Soap Suds by Pam
"Going Back to the Basics"

name: Rosemary Lavender
description:
This wonderful soap is vegan friendly! The ingredients include olive oil, rosemary infused water, coconut oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil, rosemary leaves, lavender essential oil, rosemary essential oil, vitamin E and love! Each soap weighs between 3.5 and 4.0 ounces since I cut all the soaps by hand. The benefits to handmade soaps are endless, so let SoapSudsByPam show you what we're all about!

Vegan Friendly! No Preservatives. No artificial fragrances.

name: Oats & Honey Soap
description:
Spoil yourself with this wonderful soap! This is perfect for all skin types but especially for those with sensitive skin because it does not have any synthetic ingredients. Indulge yourself with a soap that includes olive oil, coconut oil, sustainable palm oil and lots of vitamin E, along with real honey and finely ground oatmeal!

No dyes, preservatives or artificial fragrances!
